definition: thunder from a clear sky (idiom); a bolt from the blue
thunder from a clear sky (idiom); a bolt from the blue
see 噼裡啪啦|噼里啪啦[pi1 li5 pa1 la1]

sentences.english: Perak, Malaysia is currently the police are stepping into the cause.
sentences.chinese: 目前馬來西亞霹靂州警方正在加緊調查事故的原因。

sentences.english: You dance well. Do you breakdance?
sentences.chinese: 你的舞跳得真好，你跳霹靂舞嗎？

sentences.english: Thunderbolt sped by Jove 's right hand sought out the height.
sentences.chinese: 朱庇特右手發射的霹靂總是尋找高處。

sentences.english: A clap of thunder wakes the hills.
Why did the universe emerge from the Big Bang the way it did?
sentences.chinese: 宇宙緣何要從大霹靂中冒出來呢？

sentences.english: CKCMC is located in the State of Perak Manjung County.
sentences.chinese: 莫珍歪衛理公會是位於在霹靂州的曼隆縣。

sentences.english: Black people are world renowned rappers, basketball players and break dancers.
sentences.chinese: 黑人是國際知名的說唱歌手，籃球運動員和霹靂舞者。

sentences.english: However , I am also crazy about Pili Hand Puppet Shows.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我也瘋狂於霹靂布袋戲。

sentences.english: In the duration of a thunderclap in one place, two people could fall in love in another.
sentences.chinese: 甲處一聲霹靂響過，乙處一雙男女墮入了愛河。

sentences.english: He threw me into the stream and rushed away over the tree-tops with a clap of thunder.
sentences.chinese: 他把我拋進河裏後，霹靂的一聲就從樹梢上遁走了。

sentences.english: The culminating point of the performance was the break dance in the end.
sentences.chinese: 臨結束時的霹靂舞將表演推向了高潮。

sentences.english: Thunderbolt speed by jove's right hand seek out the height.
sentences.chinese: 朱庇特右手發射的霹靂總是尋找高處。

sentences.english: So far has attracted nearly 30 business knowledge to join Charlie car.
sentences.chinese: 迄今已吸引了近30家知識商家加盟霹靂車。

sentences.english: Mastering breakdancing involves learning a few finishing touches to add to your technique.
sentences.chinese: 霹靂涉及學習掌握一些收尾添加到你的技術。

sentences.english: Certain warm-ups are required to get your body ready to breakdance properly.
sentences.chinese: 某些熱身必須讓你的身體準備好霹靂。

sentences.english: The news of his death was like a bolt from the blue.
sentences.chinese: 他逝世的消息如同晴天霹靂。

definition: storm/violent commotion/fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)
lit. hiding the sky and covering the earth (idiom); fig. earth-shattering/omnipresent/of universal importance
more and more emerge/innumerable succession/breeding like flies (idiom)
to fire (a weapon) in rapid succession
live (e.g. broadcast or recording)/what is actually happening/scene/the real situation
reversal/inversion/to reverse/to invert (upside down, inside out, back to front, white to black etc)
